item.title: 全球钾肥市场对美国结束对白俄罗斯制裁的举动不以为然
item.description: 全球钾肥市场和钾肥的主要生产商基本上对美国决定解除对世界主要供应商之一的制裁置之不理，这表明阻碍钾肥流通的障碍可能会持续存在。【原文：The global potash market — and key producers of the fertilizer — largely shrugged off a US decision to lift sanctions on one of the world’s major suppliers, showing obstacles to flows are likely to persist.】

item.title: 土耳其据称酝酿提高对冲基金投资门槛
item.description: 据熟悉讨论情况的人士透露，在上个月的市场动荡之后，土耳其官员正在考虑采取新措施，大幅提高散户投资者将现金投入对冲基金的门槛。【原文：Turkish officials are considering new measures to sharply raise the bar for retail investors seeking to pile cash into hedge funds after market upheaval last month, according to people familiar with the discussions.】

item.title: 加拿大通胀率稳定在 2.2%，核心指标有所放缓
item.description: 上个月，加拿大的通货膨胀率保持稳定，而核心指标则普遍降温，因为食品和其他一些商品价格的加速上涨被服务价格增长的放缓所抵消。【原文：Inflation in Canada held steady last month while core measures broadly cooled, as accelerating price increases for food and some other goods were offset by slowing services price growth.】

item.title: 订单停滞不前，纽约工厂活动意外萎缩
item.description: 由于订单停滞和出货量减少，纽约州的工厂活动在经历了两个月的稳健增长后，12 月份意外萎缩。【原文：New York state factory activity unexpectedly shrank in December after two solid months of growth as orders stalled and shipments retreated.】

item.title: 欧洲财产保险协会（EIOPA）称德国保险公司持有 1,080 亿美元流动性不足的债务
item.description: 一家顶级监管机构在一份迄今为止最详尽的关于该行业私人信贷投资的报告中称，德国保险公司是欧洲受流动性差的公司债券影响最大的。【原文：German insurers are the most exposed in Europe to illiquid corporate bonds, a top watchdog said in one of the most detailed reports to date on the industry’s investments in private credit.】

item.title: 右翼选举大获全胜，智利股市再创新高
item.description: 极端保守派人士何塞-安东尼奥-卡斯特（José Antonio Kast）以压倒性优势赢得总统大选，预示着智利数十年来最引人注目的右倾化，智利股市周一早盘创下新纪录，比索也升至14个月高点附近。【原文：Chilean stocks hit a fresh record in early trading on Monday and the peso held near a 14-month high after ultra-conservative José Antonio Kast won the presidency by a landslide, heralding the nation’s most dramatic rightward shift in decades.】

item.title: 印度官员称俄罗斯石油进口将因更严格的检查而减少
item.description: 印度官员表示，在加强检查以确保遵守西方的限制措施后，他们预计本月从俄罗斯进口的石油将降至每天 80 万桶。【原文：Indian officials said they expect oil imports from Russia will drop to 800,000 barrels a day this month, after they tightened checks to ensure compliance with Western curbs.】

item.title: AQR 携 1,790 亿美元资产卷土重来，并对保密工作情有独钟
item.description: AQR 资本管理公司（AQR Capital Management）再次高歌猛进，各项策略均位居基准之首，资产增长速度创下历史新高。不过，在卷土重来的过程中，这家量化先锋公司收敛了一项曾使其成为对冲基金中异类的政策：在解释其投资方式时，采用了一种异常开放的方法。【原文：AQR Capital Management is riding high again, topping benchmarks across strategies and growing assets at a record pace. In the process of engineering a comeback, however, the quant pioneer has reined in a policy that once made it an outlier among hedge funds: An unusually open approach to explaining how it invests.】

item.title: Braskem 所有者 Novonor 和 IG4 推进股权出售交易
item.description: 陷入困境的企业集团诺沃诺公司（Novonor SA）即将达成一项交易，将其在石化巨头巴西石油公司（Braskem SA）的控股权出售给资产管理公司 IG4 Capital 顾问的一家基金。【原文：Troubled conglomerate Novonor SA is closer to a deal to sell its controlling stake in petrochemical giant Braskem SA to a fund advised by asset manager IG4 Capital.】

item.title: CLO 管理者豪赌收购复兴将在 2026 年提升利润
item.description: 据债务管理公司称，备受瞩目的企业收购活动很可能会蔓延到 2026 年，从而刺激对杠杆融资的需求，据估计，这种需求可能会翻一番。【原文：A flare up in high-profile corporate buyouts is likely to spread into 2026, spurring demand for leveraged financing that could double by some estimates, according to debt managers.】

item.title: 尼日利亚 CPI 降温幅度超预期，打开降息大门
item.description: 尼日利亚 11 月份的通胀放缓幅度超过预期，这为决策者在 2 月份举行下次会议时恢复降息提供了更多理由。【原文：Nigerian inflation eased more than anticipated in November, strengthening the case for policymakers to resume interest-rate cuts when they next meet in February.】

item.title: 瑞典大型银行加入政府应对混合动力威胁的行列
item.description: 瑞典最大的商业银行等 13 家金融公司参与了一项由政府发起的新倡议，该倡议旨在更好地保护瑞典免受网络攻击等混合战争的威胁。【原文：Sweden’s biggest commercial banks are among 13 financial companies taking part in a new government-run initiative to better protect the country from threats of hybrid warfare such as cyberattacks.】

item.title: Netflix 首席执行官为华纳兄弟收购案辩护
item.description: 在竞争对手派拉蒙天舞公司（Paramount Skydance Corp.）公开提出竞争性、敌意报价之后，Netflix 公司的两位首席执行官阐述了该公司收购华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros Discovery Inc.【原文：The two chief executive officers of Netflix Inc. laid out the company’s case for acquiring Warner Bros Discovery Inc., after rival Paramount Skydance Corp. went public with a competing, hostile offer.】

item.title: 摩根大通认为瑞银妥协将 CET1 需求降至 4 亿美元
item.description: 据摩根大通分析师估计，如果瑞士立法者上周就有争议的监管改革提出的妥协方案获得通过，瑞银集团对最高质量资本的需求将降至 4 亿美元左右。【原文：UBS Group AG’s need for the highest-quality form of capital would drop to around $400 million if a compromise proposal on controversial regulatory reforms put forward by Swiss lawmakers last week was adopted, according to estimates from JPMorgan Chase & Co analysts.】

item.title: 美国出口热潮意味着与廉价的美国天然气说再见
item.description: 特朗普对美国能源主导地位的渴望可能意味着国内价格的上涨。【原文：Trump’s desire for US energy dominance could mean higher prices at home.】

item.title: 中国稳定的 GDP 掩盖了出口激增、房地产下滑的 "大分化
item.description: 经济学家称 2026 年需要更多刺激措施来恢复消费【原文：Economists say more stimulus will be needed in 2026 to revive consumption】

item.title: 复星计划收购备受争议的老年痴呆症药物制造商
item.description: 上海复星医药集团有限公司宣布计划收购一家中国公司的控股权，该公司开发出了中国首个治疗阿尔茨海默病的本土疗法，但后来却停止了销售和生产。【原文：Shanghai Fosun Pharmaceutical Group Co. announced plans to acquire a controlling stake in a Chinese company that developed the country’s first indigenous therapy for Alzheimer’s disease only to wind up later suspending sales and production.】

item.title: 迪士尼在 OpenAI 与谷歌的竞争中选择了一方
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，奥斯汀-卡尔（Austin Carr）将探讨迪斯尼对人工智能公司使用其版权人物形象的不同回应方式。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Austin Carr looks at the different ways Disney has responded to AI companies using images of its copyrighted characters.】

item.title: 由 OpenAI 支持的 Chai Discovery 为人工智能设计分子融资 1.3 亿美元
item.description: 由 OpenAI 支持的人工智能药物发现公司 Chai Discovery 已融资 1.3 亿美元，用于建立分子的 "计算机辅助设计套件"。【原文：Chai Discovery, an artificial intelligence drug-discovery company backed by OpenAI, has raised $130 million to build a “computer-aided design suite” for molecules.】

item.title: 在互联网上，没人知道你是人类
item.description:
深度伪造和聊天机器人现在已经足够出色，以至于许多网络用户不相信他们是在与真人互动。【原文：

Deepfakes and chatbots are now good enough that many web users don’t trust they are interacting with real people.

item.title: 特朗普在人工智能主导权争夺战中模糊了国家与私人的界限
item.description: 特朗普称霸全球人工智能的目标存在无数疑问【原文：Myriad questions surround Trump’s goal of global AI dominance】

item.title: 亚马逊股东决议针对与以色列和国土安全部的人工智能合作
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）与以色列军方和美国国土安全部的业务联系是一项股东提案的焦点，提案要求该公司调查此类合同是否符合其负责任的人工智能政策。【原文：Amazon.com Inc.’s business ties with Israel’s military and the US Department of Homeland Security are the focus of a shareholder proposal demanding that the company investigate whether such contracts comply with its responsible AI policies.】

item.title: 核工业在 2025 年衰退后明年将增加 15 座反应堆
item.description: 根据彭博核能基金会（BloombergNEF）的数据，全球核工业预计将在 2026 年启用 15 座反应堆，这是继今年总容量实际缩减 1.1 千兆瓦之后的又一次大幅增长。【原文：The nuclear industry is expected to switch on 15 reactors globally in 2026, a big jump after total capacity actually shrank by 1.1 gigawatts this year, according to BloombergNEF.】

item.title: 巴西经济活动不及预期，高利率阻碍经济增长
item.description: 巴西 10 月份的经济活动意外下降，这是拉丁美洲最大经济体正在降温的最新迹象。【原文：Brazil’s activity unexpectedly dropped in October, in the latest sign Latin America’s largest economy is cooling off.】

item.title: 希普罗克准备成立由前德意志银行交易员领导的新对冲基金
item.description: 专门从事不良债务和特殊情况交易的 Shiprock Capital Management 正准备明年推出新的对冲基金。【原文：Shiprock Capital Management, which specializes in distressed debt and special situations trading, is preparing to launch a new hedge fund next year.】

item.title: 好莱坞如何与人工智能抗衡而不自取灭亡？
item.description: 娱乐业在与时俱进和让人才满意之间纠结不已。【原文：The entertainment industry is torn between keeping up and keeping talent happy.】

item.title: 德国迈耶轮船公司获得地中海邮轮 100 亿欧元订单
item.description: 德国经济部长凯瑟琳娜-雷切（Katherina Reiche）表示，德国造船商迈耶-维尔特公司（Meyer Werft）与瑞士邮轮运营商地中海邮轮公司（MSC Cruises）签订了一份价值 100 亿欧元（约合 117 亿美元）的订单，该订单将持续到 2033 年。【原文：German shipbuilder Meyer Werft has clinched an order worth €10 billion ($11.7 billion) through 2033 with Swiss cruise operator MSC Cruises, according to Economy Minister Katherina Reiche.】

item.title: 南非为电网建设挑选七家通过资格预审的投标人
item.description: 南非电力部为该国 4,400 亿兰特（约合人民币 260 亿元）的输电网扩建计划挑选了七组公司作为资格预审合格的投标人。【原文：South Africa’s electricity ministry selected seven groups of companies as pre-qualified bidders for the country’s 440 billion rand ($26 billion) transmission-grid expansion program.】

item.title: 房利美和房地美悄然为抵押债券投资组合增资数十亿美元
item.description: 房利美（Fannie Mae）和房地美（Freddie Mac）最近几个月在其资产负债表上增加了数十亿美元的抵押贷款支持证券和住房贷款，这加剧了人们的猜测，即它们正试图在可能的公开募股之前压低贷款利率并提高盈利能力。【原文：Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac have added billions of dollars of mortgage-backed securities and home loans to their balance sheets in recent months, fueling speculation that they’re trying to push down lending rates and boost their profitability ahead of a potential public offering.】

item.title: 据说苏黎世航空餐饮业巨头 Gategroup 将为首次公开募股挑选银行
item.description: 据知情人士透露，全球最大的机上餐饮公司 Gategroup Holding AG 已经选定了首次公开募股的银行，最快可能在明年下半年上市。【原文：The world’s biggest in-flight caterer Gategroup Holding AG has selected banks for an initial public offering, which could take place as soon as the second half of next year, people familiar with the matter said.】
